title:
Sundar Pichai’s opulent lifestyle: Discover the priciest possessions of the 
CEO of Alphabet Inc.
text: The Financial Express Get ready to step into the lavish world of Sundar Pichai, the distinguished CEO of Alphabet Inc. and its subsidiary, Google. With a staggering annual income, Pichai has crafted a lifestyle that epitomizes luxury in every facet. In 2022, the 50-year-old tech leader took away a whopping $226 million in compensation, which included $218 million in stock awards. Pichai has risen to prominence as one of the most influential figures in the tech industry. His journey from humble beginnings in Chennai, India, to leading one of the world’s foremost companies is not only a tale of professional success but also a narrative of acquiring a lifestyle commensurate with his achievements. Born in Chennai, Sundar Pichai embarked on his journey from the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur to earning a Master’s degree at Stanford University. His strategic leadership at Google ushered in significant growth and innovation, with pivotal contributions to products like Google Chrome, Android, and Google Drive. Appointed as CEO of Google in 2015, Pichai has ushered in a new era for the company. Let’s delve into the possessions of this tech titan and explore the inspiring story of his ascent to the summit. Sundar Pichai’s residence is nothing short of a masterpiece. Valued at a staggering $40 million, this heavenly abode sprawls across 31.17 acres in Los Altos, Santa Clara County, California. Adorned by the artistic touch of his wife, Anjali, the mansion features luxurious amenities, including an infinity pool, gym, spa, wine cellar, solar panels, and dedicated quarters. Among his fleet of luxury cars is the magnificent Mercedes-Maybach S650, valued at Rs 3.21 crores. With a 6.0-litre Twin-Turbo V12 engine, producing 523 horsepower and 830 Nm of torque, this automotive gem reaches a top speed of 190 km/hr. Its opulence is complemented by automatic weather control. Pichai’s collection includes the grand BMW 730 LD, a masterpiece worth Rs 1.35 crore. Powered by a robust 2993 cc engine, generating 261 bhp and 620 Nm of torque, this chariot boasts automatic temperature control, offering unrivaled luxury. The tech titan owns the luxurious Mercedes V Class, valued at a staggering Rs 71.05 lakhs. With an automatic diesel mechanism and an engine ranging from 1950 cc to 2143 cc, this automotive marvel generates 160.92 to 161.0 Bhp and an impressive 380 Nm of torque, comfortably accommodating up to seven passengers. These are just a glimpse of Sundar Pichai’s grand possessions. His journey from a middle-class upbringing to Google’s CEO serves as an inspiring testament to determination and brilliance. Pichai’s opulent lifestyle, marked by extravagant properties, luxury vehicles, and an impressive collection, reflects his extraordinary accomplishments. As he continues to lead Google into the future, Pichai’s story inspires aspiring entrepreneurs worldwide.
